getRealRootCause

public java.lang.Throwable getRealRootCause()
get the real root cause. if several LoggingExceptions are nested within each other, return the very root one.

Returns:
a throwable

printStackTrace

public void printStackTrace()
Print our stack trace and that of the source exception if there is one. Print to the standard error stream.
